038° 45 'E

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 12.
Athalia obsoleta
. A & C, dorsal views. B & D, lateral views. A–B, males (P3655_1 & P3616), body length: 7.0 mm. C–D, female (P3615), body length: 8.5 mm.

Host plant.
Brassicaceae (
Opitz et al . 2012
)
.

Remarks.
Benson ( 1962 )
distinguished three geographical races (or subspecies) of
Athalia himantopus
: the nominotypical form
A. himantopus himantopus
, as well as
A. himantopus truncata
and
A. himantopus obsoleta
. All these subspecies are recognized as valid species of the
A. himantopus
species group (
Koch 2007
).
